name: Spinnicus
description:
Welcome into the arena! Test your worth killing the ghosts of those who came before you ... Use your harpoon to grab your opponents and throw them over each other, like "An Unconventional Weapon"!

Made for Ludum dare 32 by @NickZangus

Spinnicus is still in development! Follow it on Facebook to stay updated on future releases and give me feedback or suggestions.

Controls:

WASD > Movement
Press and hold left mouse button over an enemy > grab
Release left mouse button > release

Gameplay on YouTube

All the contents were created during the 72 hours except for the followings:

Music by Kevin MacLeod
Font by Dieter Steffmann
Some sound effects from freeSFX

#LDJAM
